description: The EC2 API call DescribeImages has no unit tests. I spent almost a day trying to make some half decent ones, but it needs more work in the image service abstraction layer than I had time to throw at it.
title: DescribeImages has no unit tests

comments.content: The EC2 API call DescribeImages has no unit tests. I spent almost a day trying to make some half decent ones, but it needs more work in the image service abstraction layer than I had time to throw at it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
